Class IVTRepeatElement

java.lang.Object
  com.immersion.uhl.IVTElement

public class IVTRepeatElement
extends IVTElement

Represents a Repeat element within a Timeline effect in an IVT buffer.

Constructor Detail

IVTRepeatElement

public IVTRepeatElement(int time,
                        int repeatCount,
                        int duration)
Initializes this IVT Repeat element.

Parameters:
time - Time in milliseconds of the IVT Repeat element within the Timeline effect.
repeatCount - Number of times to repeat the events occurring between time and time + duration within the Timeline effect.
duration - Length of the interval in milliseconds over which to repeat events.
